item.title: Ok My first attempt at a scar script
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

procedure antiban; FindNormalRandoms;

procedure UsaRandoms;
begin
CloseWindow;
Wait(1);
FindTalk;
Wait(1);
FindDead;
Wait(1);
FindMime;
Wait(1);
FindMaze;
Wait(1);
FindQuiz;
Wait(1);
FindScapeRune;
Wait(1);
ClickToContinue;
Wait(1);
FindFrog;
Wait(1);
FindTalk;
Wait(10+Random(50));
end;
end;

This is not your script, and if it is I pity you.

item.title: Ok My first attempt at a scar script
item.dc:creator: @buckleyindahouse buckleyindahouse
item.description:
@buckleyindahouse wrote:

wow, thnx to all of you for the help.
Im going to edit it and see what happens.

[br][size=1]Posted at: December 02, 2006, 12:02:43 PM[/size][hr]Hopefull 1 of yall will come back to this form but i get this error now.

Failed when compiling
Line 27: [Error] (27:1): Identifier expected in script C:Program FilesSCAR 2.03Scriptspowerchopper.scar
Line 28: [Error] (28:1): colon (’:’) expected in script C:Program FilesSCAR 2.03Scriptspowerchopper.scar

the script is below.

[scar]program powerchopper;

{.include/srl/SRL.scar}
{include SRL/SRL/Skill/Woodcutting.scar}

var
wc1,wc2,logcolor,time,autotalker,AxeEquipped,

const //________________________________________
wc1= 152215 //color of the tree u chopping
wc2= 526598 //another color of the tree u dropping
logcolor= 15251 // color of the log in the inventory
time= 1000 //the time it takes to cut down a tree(1000=1 sec)
autotalker =3 //1 = bored 2= happy 3= mad(best 1 prolly)
AxeEquipped = true //Is Axe Equipped? True=wieled False=not wielded \

Procedure DeclarePlayers;
Begin
HowManyPlayers := 1; // Set Number of Players here.
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers); // Sets the Players Array Length;
CurrentPlayer := 0; // CurrentPlayer = Array Index

Players[0].Name := '';   //Username
Players[0].Pass := ''; //Password
Players[0].Nick := '';         //3 or 4 letters username
Players[0].Loc := '';               //Leave as blank
Players[0].Skill := 'Woodcutting';  //The skill for when you get a lamp
Players[0].Active := True;

Writeln(inttostr(HowManyPlayers) + ’ Players’);
End;

//////////////////////Tree Finder///////////////////////////////////
procedure treekiller;
begin
setupSRL;
if findcolorspiral(x,y,wc1,3,3,515,336) or
findcolorspiral(x,y,wc2,3,3,515,336) then begin
mmouse(x,y,3,3)
(IsUpTextMulti(‘Chop’,‘op’,‘Ch’)
mouse(x,y,2,2,true)
wait(2000*time+random(500));
until(invfull)
if (invfull = true) then begin
logdropper;
end;

procedure logdropper;
begin
if(AxeEquipped) then
DropTo(1,28)
else
DropTo(2,28)
end;

procedure antiban;
FindNormalRandoms;

procedure UsaRandoms;
begin
CloseWindow;
Wait(1);
FindTalk;
Wait(1);
FindDead;
Wait(1);
FindMime;
Wait(1);
FindMaze;
Wait(1);
FindQuiz;
Wait(1);
FindScapeRune;
Wait(1);
ClickToContinue;
Wait(1);
FindFrog;
Wait(1);
FindTalk;
Wait(10+Random(50));
end;
end;
//all the randoms u will need till i get more scripting exp

procedure autotalker;
if autotalker=1 then begin
TypeSend(‘Gosh, i hate woodcutting it is so boring’+random(‘fds’));
wait(40000+random(20000));
TypeSend(‘I hate my woodcutting lvl’);
wait(40000+random(20000));
TypeSend(‘This is so boring’);
end;

if autotalker=2 then begin
TypeSend(‘I love woodcutting’);
wait(40000+random(20000));
TypeSend(‘Wc is so fun this is why i do it, i want to cut magic Trees’);
wait(40000+random(20000));
TypeSend(‘w00t’);
wait(40000+random(20000));

if autotalker=3 then begin
TypeSend(’ i dont mean to be mean but i dont feel like talking, im mad’);
wait(40000+random(20000));
TypeSend(‘ooooo i hate my mom, dont ask any questions’);
wait(40000+random(20000));
TypeSend(‘dang my bro gets on my nerves, always messing with me’);
wait(40000+random(20000));
end;

procedure main;
SetupSRL;
DeclarePlayers;
Repeat;
treekiller;
antiban;
autotalker;
WriteIn(’ Made By Buckleyindahouse ‘)
WriteIn(’ Contact me at Bigbwoi2000@hotmail.com ‘)
WriteIn(’ Hopefully Script Wil Work ')
end;
end.[/scar]

Read full topic

item.title: Ok My first attempt at a scar script
item.dc:creator: @hey321 hey321
item.description:
@hey321 wrote:

Akriam good job ;).

Now Buckley good first try you did something wrong with your dropping procedure tho:

[php]
procedure dropit;
begin
DropTo(2,28);
wait(500+random(600));DropTo(3,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(4,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(5,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(6,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(7,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(8,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(9,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(10,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(11,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(12,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(13,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(14,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(15,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(16,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(17,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(18,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(19,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(20,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(21,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(22,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(23,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(24,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(25,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(26,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(27,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(28,28);
wait(500+random(600));
end;[/php]

That’s your current one. It will fook up your script as it will interfere with each other, you need this.

[php]
Begin
If (AxeEquipped) Then
DropTo(1,28)
Else
DropTo(2,28)[/php]

Then just put AxeEquipped in the constant as a boolean and it should work.

Also, try to use TypeSend in your talking procedure not SendKeys :).
You also forgot colons up top at the const.
You ALSO forgot to call the variables an iteger ;).

Here’s the fixed up version:

[php]
program powerchopper;

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{include SRL/SRL/Skill/Woodcutting.scar}

const
wc1= 152215; //color of the tree u chopping
wc2= 526598; //another color of the tree u dropping
logcolor= 15251; // color of the log in the inventory
time= 1000 ; //the time it takes to cut down a tree(1000=1 sec)
autotalker =3; //1 = bored 2= mad(best 1 prolly)
AxeEquipped=True; //False if it’s in your inven, needed for dropping procedure

Procedure DeclarePlayers;
Begin
HowManyPlayers:= 2; // Set Number of Players here.
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers); // Sets the Players Array Length;
CurrentPlayer := 0; // CurrentPlayer = Array Index

Players[0].Name := '';   //Username
Players[0].Pass := ''; //Password
Players[0].Nick := '';         //3 or 4 letters username
Players[0].Active := True;

Players[1].Name := '';   //Username
Players[1].Pass := ''; //Password
Players[1].Nick := '';         //3 or 4 letters username
Players[1].Active := True;

Writeln(inttostr(HowManyPlayers) + ’ Players’);
End;

procedure NoBan;
Begin
FindNormalRandoms;
end;
//all the randoms u will need till i get more scripting exp

procedure Responder;
Begin
if autotalker=1 then
begin
Case Random(20) of
1: TypeSend(‘Gosh, i hate woodcutting it is so boring’);
2: Sleep(40000+random(20000));
3: TypeSend(‘I hate my woodcutting lvl’);
4: Sleep(40000+random(20000));
5: TypeSend(‘This is so boring’);
end;

if autotalker=2 then
begin
Case Random(20) of
1: TypeSend(’ i dont mean to be mean but i dont feel like talking, im mad’);
2: Sleep(40000+random(20000));
3: TypeSend(‘ooooo i hate my mom, dont ask any questions’);
4: Sleep(40000+random(20000));
5: TypeSend(‘dang my bro gets on my nerves, always messing with me’);
end;
end;

Procedure LogDropper;
Begin
If (AxeEquipped) Then
DropTo(1,28)
Else
DropTo(2,28)
End;

//////////////////////Tree Finder///////////////////////////////////
procedure treekiller;
begin
NoBan;
Responder;
if findcolorspiral(x,y,wc1,3,3,515,336) or
findcolorspiral(x,y,wc2,3,3,515,336) then begin
mmouse(x,y,3,3)
(IsUpTextMulti(‘Chop’,‘op’,‘Ch’) then
mouse(x,y,2,2,true)
wait(2000*time+random(500));
If InvCount=28 Then
end;

procedure main;
Begin
SetupSRL;
DeclarePlayers;
Repeat;
treekiller;
LogDropper;
NoBan;
autotalker;
WriteIn(’ Made By Buckleyindahouse ‘);
WriteIn(’ Contact me at Bigbwoi2000@hotmail.com ‘);
WriteIn(’ Hopefully Script Wil Work ');
end.[/php]

Gives me a wierd error about identifier expected still but keep trying to fix it

Read full topic

item.title: Ok My first attempt at a scar script
item.dc:creator: @Akriam Akriam
item.description:
@Akriam wrote:

Ok there were some errors but it was pretty good.

First off:

[scar]findcolorspiral(x,y:wc2,3,3,515,336)[/scar] should be
[scar]findcolorspiral(x,y,wc2,3,3,515,336)[/scar] (same with other one)

Instead of:
[scar]istextat2 (9,9’chop’,20)[/scar]

use:
[scar](IsUpTextMulti(‘Chop’,‘op’,‘Ch’)[/scar]

Declare the dropit procedure before the time you use it otherwise you will get an error. Also there is an SRL procedure that is [scar]dropto(2-28);[/scar] instead of that long procedure you made.

In your antiban but the findnormalrandoms after the begin. Also for the responder use cases. I’ll fix it up a bit.

[scar]
program powerchopper;

{.include/srl/SRL.scar}
{include/srl/Woodcutting.scar}

var
wc1,wc2,logcolor,time,autotalker

const
wc1= 152215 //color of the tree u chopping
wc2= 526598 //another color of the tree u dropping
logcolor= 15251 // color of the log in the inventory
time= 1000 //the time it takes to cut down a tree(1000=1 sec)
autotalker =3 //1 = bored 2= happy 3= mad(best 1 prolly)

Procedure DeclarePlayers;
Begin
HowManyPlayers := 1; // Set Number of Players here.
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers); // Sets the Players Array Length;
CurrentPlayer := 0; // CurrentPlayer = Array Index

Players[0].Name := '';   //Username
Players[0].Pass := ''; //Password
Players[0].Nick := '';         //3 or 4 letters username
Players[0].Loc := '';               //Leave as blank
Players[0].Skill := 'Woodcutting';  //The skill for when you get a lamp
Players[0].Active := True;

Writeln(inttostr(HowManyPlayers) + ’ Players’);
End;

procedure antiban;
FindNormalRandoms;
procedure UsaRandoms;
begin
CloseWindow;
Wait(1);
FindTalk;
Wait(1);
FindDead;
Wait(1);
FindMime;
Wait(1);
FindMaze;
Wait(1);
FindQuiz;
Wait(1);
FindScapeRune;
Wait(1);
ClickToContinue;
Wait(1);
FindFrog;
Wait(1);
FindTalk;
Wait(10+Random(50));
end;
end;
//all the randoms u will need till i get more scripting exp

procedure autotalker;
if autotalker=1 then
begin Case Random(20) of
1: sendkeys(‘Gosh, i hate woodcutting it is so boring’+random(‘fds’));
wait(40000+random(20000));
2: sendkeys(‘I hate my woodcutting lvl’);
wait(40000+random(20000));
3: sendkeys(‘This is so boring’);
end;

if autotalker=2 then begin
Case Random(20) of
1: sendkeys(‘I love woodcutting’);
wait(40000+random(20000));
2: sendkeys(‘Wc is so fun this is why i do it, i want to cut magic Trees’);
wait(40000+random(20000));
3: sendkeys(‘w00t’);
wait(40000+random(20000));

if autotalker=3 then begin
Case Random(20) of
1: sendkeys(’ i dont mean to be mean but i dont feel like talking, im mad’);
wait(40000+random(20000));
2: sendkeys(‘ooooo i hate my mom, dont ask any questions’);
wait(40000+random(20000));
3: sendkeys(‘dang my bro gets on my nerves, always messing with me’);
wait(40000+random(20000));
end;
end;
end;

//////////////////////Tree Finder///////////////////////////////////
procedure treekiller;
begin
setupSRL;
antiban;
autotalker;
if findcolorspiral(x,y,wc1,3,3,515,336) or
findcolorspiral(x,y,wc2,3,3,515,336) then begin
mmouse(x,y,3,3)
(IsUpTextMulti(‘Chop’,‘op’,‘Ch’) then
mouse(x,y,2,2,true)
wait(2000*time+random(500));
until(invfull)
if (invfull = true) then begin
dropto(2,28);
end;

procedure main;
treekiller;
antiban;
autotalker;
WriteIn(’ Made By Buckleyindahouse ‘)
WriteIn(’ Contact me at Bigbwoi2000@hotmail.com ‘)
WriteIn(’ Hopefully Script Wil Work ')
end;
end;
end.

[/scar]

Read full topic

item.title: Ok My first attempt at a scar script
item.dc:creator: @buckleyindahouse buckleyindahouse
item.description:
@buckleyindahouse wrote:

I would like yall to tell me everything i did wrong and how i can fix it. Thank you for your replies.
[scar]program powerchopper;

{.include/srl/SRL.scar}
{include/srl/Woodcutting.scar}

var
wc1,wc2,logcolor,time,autotalker

const
wc1= 152215 //color of the tree u chopping
wc2= 526598 //another color of the tree u dropping
logcolor= 15251 // color of the log in the inventory
time= 1000 //the time it takes to cut down a tree(1000=1 sec)
autotalker =3 //1 = bored 2= happy 3= mad(best 1 prolly)

Procedure DeclarePlayers;
Begin
HowManyPlayers := 1; // Set Number of Players here.
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers); // Sets the Players Array Length;
CurrentPlayer := 0; // CurrentPlayer = Array Index

Players[0].Name := '';   //Username
Players[0].Pass := ''; //Password
Players[0].Nick := '';         //3 or 4 letters username
Players[0].Loc := '';               //Leave as blank
Players[0].Skill := 'Woodcutting';  //The skill for when you get a lamp
Players[0].Active := True;

Writeln(inttostr(HowManyPlayers) + ’ Players’);
End;

//////////////////////Tree Finder///////////////////////////////////
procedure treekiller;
begin
setupSRL;
if findcolorspiral(x,y:wc1,3,3,515,336) or
findcolorspiral(x,y:wc2,3,3,515,336) then begin
mmouse(x,y,3,3)
istextat2 (9,9’chop’,20)
mouse(x,y,2,2,true)
wait(2000*time+random(500));
until(invfull)
if (invfull = true) then begin
dropit;
end;

//////////////////Drop Procedure/////////////////////////
procedure dropit;
begin
DropTo(2,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(3,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(4,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(5,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(6,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(7,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(8,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(9,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(10,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(11,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(12,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(13,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(14,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(15,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(16,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(17,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(18,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(19,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(20,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(21,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(22,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(23,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(24,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(25,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(26,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(27,28);
wait(500+random(600));
DropTo(28,28);
wait(500+random(600));
end;

procedure antiban;
FindNormalRandoms;
procedure UsaRandoms;
begin
CloseWindow;
Wait(1);
FindTalk;
Wait(1);
FindDead;
Wait(1);
FindMime;
Wait(1);
FindMaze;
Wait(1);
FindQuiz;
Wait(1);
FindScapeRune;
Wait(1);
ClickToContinue;
Wait(1);
FindFrog;
Wait(1);
FindTalk;
Wait(10+Random(50));
end;
end;
//all the randoms u will need till i get more scripting exp

procedure autotalker;
if autotalker=1 then begin
sendkeys(‘Gosh, i hate woodcutting it is so boring’+random(‘fds’));
wait(40000+random(20000));
sendkeys(‘I hate my woodcutting lvl’);
wait(40000+random(20000));
sendkeys(‘This is so boring’);
end;

if autotalker=2 then begin
sendkeys(‘I love woodcutting’);
wait(40000+random(20000));
sendkeys(‘Wc is so fun this is why i do it, i want to cut magic Trees’);
wait(40000+random(20000));
sendkeys(‘w00t’);
wait(40000+random(20000));

if autotalker=3 then begin
sendkeys(’ i dont mean to be mean but i dont feel like talking, im mad’);
wait(40000+random(20000));
sendkeys(‘ooooo i hate my mom, dont ask any questions’);
wait(40000+random(20000));
sendkeys(‘dang my bro gets on my nerves, always messing with me’);
wait(40000+random(20000));
end;

procedure main;
treekiller;
antiban;
autotalker;
WriteIn(’ Made By Buckleyindahouse ‘)
WriteIn(’ Contact me at Bigbwoi2000@hotmail.com ‘)
WriteIn(’ Hopefully Script Wil Work ')
end;
end;
end.[/scar]
